document.full_text: texas gov. rick perry sought additional federal help in battling wildfires across his drought-parched state as a woodland blaze gutted at least six homes on sunday and threatened hundreds more in austin, the state capital.
document.title: texas seeks more help as wildfires burn austin homes
lines_and_colors: texas gov. rick perry sought additional federal help in battling wildfires across his drought-parched state as a woodland blaze gutted at least six homes on sunday and threatened hundreds more in austin, the state capital.
